greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of A003415(d) over the divisors d of n, where A003415 is arithmetic derivative.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
